tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LiteratureReviewInsights (
  paper_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  title STRING,
  author STRING,
  publication_date DATE,
  insights TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE literature_review_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    author TEXT,
    year_published INT,
    abstract TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE visualization_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    chart_type TEXT,
    data_source TEXT,
    x_axis TEXT,
    y_axis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Literature_Review (
  paper_id INT,
  paper_title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(100),
  publication_date DATE,
  keywords TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE literature_review (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
           paper_title VARCHAR,
           author VARCHAR,
           publication_date DATE,
           topic VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE keywords (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
           keyword VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE insights (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
           overview TEXT,
           analysis TEXT,
           visualization_tool VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE publications (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
           publication_title VARCHAR,
           publication_year INT,
           publisher VARCHAR);
